northern-stone.description: Grey castle stone with Voronoi block pattern and FBM grain. Used for walls, floors, columns, arches, hearths.

ironwood.description: Dark ironwood with vertical grain and knots. Used for columns, beams, furniture, thrones, doors.

dark-iron.description: Aged dark iron with scratches. Used for chandeliers, braziers, torch holders, candle trees, weapon racks.

leather.description: Leather with subtle Voronoi grain. Used for chair seats, book covers, belts, armor straps.

ceramic.note: Inline material in generate_prop.py, not a factory function
ceramic.description: Simple ceramic/pottery. Used for plates, goblets, jugs.

fabric.note: Inline material in generate_prop.py, not a factory function
fabric.description: Cloth and fabric. Colors vary per item. Used for banners, tapestries, rushes, cloaks.

wax.description: Candle wax. Off-white to cream color. Used for candle stubs, wax drips.

bone.description: Animal bone or antler. Cream to yellowish. Used for antlers, bone decorations.

fur.description: Animal fur/pelt. Used for rugs, cloaks, sleeping hounds.

food.description: Food items. Colors vary. Used for bread, cheese, meat, fruit on platters.
